title: PBE Eligibility Error
body: Each time i try to see if im eligible it just says "something went wrong refresh and try again" which I have been for the past 20 mins. Any reason why?

replies.body: Everyone remain calm! ^^  There's just a lot of traffic.  Give it some time and you should be able to use it.

How long will we have to wait i've been playing 4 years and applied the last time pbe applications are open. now that its publicised more, i might not be able to even apply, so i kinda want some help...
As long as you are at least Honor 3, you will be able to apply.  Just hang tight while the traffic blows over, and you'll get your chance!

Yeah I've been playing for roughly 5 or so years and would love to get in on the PBE scene but I get the same error every time I try to check even hours apart.

{{sticker:sg-janna}}
how long are we going to be able to sign-up for the PBE for?
